entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
